channel.title: [317][delta]how do i make npcs not aggressive
channel.description: well i quit makeing private servers for abit and now....now i forgot most of the stuff i knew what i need to know is how to make npcs non aggressive untill you attack them

item.title: [317][delta]how do i make npcs not aggressive
item.dc:creator: @icereign2 icereign2
item.description:
@icereign2 wrote:

go to npc handler and look at
public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) { switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {

and there will be somthing like
case ####:

the ####'s are the npc ids

just delete them and ur npc will not be agressive anymore

Read full topic
